review: Doctor is very friendly and empathetic. I met him once and he remembered me. Feels like i personally know him. His treatment is thorough. Would definitely recommend him to everyone.
Doctor was very good at analysis and suggesting treatment for my wife, he clearly explained the treatment plan and gave us confidence to recover soon. He is easily approachable and friendly.

Would highly recommend consulting Dr.Rakshit Shetty at Kasper clinic Indiranagar. He makes you feel so comfortable and treats you really well. The staffs are also well mannered and friendly. They all were really helping and the clinic is also well maintained. 
Dr.Rakshit helped me recover from my illness within no time.
Excellent consultation. Put my mind at rest over so many issues. I would definitely recommend him.  Efficient service by the staff as well.

I visited Kasper centre today and saw Dr. Rakshith Shetty for a sore throat. I was really impressed by how clean everything was and Dr. Rakshith Shetty was fantastic. It felt like everyone there knew exactly how to be welcoming and polite, highly recommended

Dr. Rakshith shetty is very good in patients care, he is a good listener, always smile on his face makes the patients comfortable to share their problems,daignosis was to the points, ** *********** *********** *** *************** The clinic is well maintained and all staffs are so helpful and caring. 10/10 recommended

I have been consulting Dr Rakshith Shetty since last 5 years. He treats with minimal meds and the best possible remedy,never suggests any extra tests. Always explains the root cause of the problem and course of treatment patiently in layman's term.He makes you feel confident and relieved with his warm approach.Really grateful to his care,excellent diagnostic skills and commitment.Strongly recommended.
Great family clinic. Very well maintained. Staff are very courteous. Best team of doctors available. Their diagnostic services are top notch with almost zero waiting time most recommended

visited kasper clinic for fever and body pains. dr.rakshith and team took great care of my mother. doctor did not write too many medicines . simple medication and treatment. she recovered well and good.
